dynamicLookup.nsql: SELECT @SELECT:INV.ID:ID@ ,@SELECT:INV.CODE:CODE@ ,@SELECT:INV.NAME:NAME@ ,@SELECT:INV.ODF_OBJECT_CODE:OBJECT_CODE@ ,@SELECT:CAP.NAME:TYPE_NAME@ FROM INV_INVESTMENTS INV JOIN ( select S.ID SEC_ID, O.ID OBJECT_ID, O.CODE OBJECT_CODE from ODF_OBJECT_EXTENSIONS OE, ODF_OBJECTS O, CMN_SEC_OBJECTS S where O.CODE = OE.OBJECT_CODE and OE.EXTENSION_CODE = 'inv' and S.OBJECT_TYPE_CODE = 'RECORD' and S.COMPONENT_CODE = 'INV' and S.OBJECT_CODE in (O.RIGHT_CODE, CONCAT('odf_cst_', O.RIGHT_CODE)) and O.CODE not in ('service', 'asset', 'product', 'application', 'other') ) obj_info on INV.ODF_OBJECT_CODE = obj_info.OBJECT_CODE join CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS CAP on obj_info.OBJECT_ID = CAP.PK_ID and CAP.TABLE_NAME = 'ODF_OBJECTS' and CAP.LANGUAGE_CODE = @WHERE:PARAM:LANGUAGE_CODE@ left join INV_PROJECTS PRJ on INV.ID = PRJ.PRID WHERE @FILTER@ @BROWSE-ONLY: and ( exists ( select 'x' from CMN_SEC_CHK_USER_R_V GLB where GLB.USER_ID = @WHERE:PARAM:USER_ID@ and GLB.OBJECT_ID = obj_info.SEC_ID and GLB.OBJECT_TYPE = 'RECORD' and GLB.COMPONENT_CODE = 'INV' and GLB.PERMISSION_CODE = 'InvestmentViewManagement' ) or exists ( select 'x' from CMN_SEC_CHK_USER_V0 INST where INST.USER_ID = @WHERE:PARAM:USER_ID@ and obj_info.SEC_ID = INST.OBJECT_ID and INST.OBJECT_INSTANCE_ID = INV.ID and INST.PERMISSION_CODE = 'InvestmentViewManagement' ) ) and @NVL@(PRJ.IS_PROGRAM, 0) = 0 and INV.ODF_TEMPLATE = 0 and INV.IS_ACTIVE = 1 :BROWSE-ONLY@
